numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that young men visit their parents less often than young women visit their parents.
2. I wonder why young men visit their parents less often than young women visit their parents.
3. I notice that around the summer most pedestrians are young women.
4. I have not seen these young women during the entire year.
5. The headline is: How to have the best family vacation, Step 1 visit them.
